sentences.english: Rivers and lakes might dry up in some places, and glaciers might melt.
sentences.chinese: 某些地方的河川跟湖泊可能干涸，冰河也可能溶化。

sentences.english: This natural lake is more than 3500 years old.
sentences.chinese: 这种天然湖泊已经3500多岁了。

sentences.english: The central area is characterized by many lakes, bogs and low ridges.
sentences.chinese: 中部的平原地带以众多的湖泊，沼泽和低岭为特点。

sentences.english: The Shuanglong Lake is a shallow and urban lake, it had been a serious typical eutrophic lake.
sentences.chinese: 双龙湖是浅水型城市湖泊，一度为重富营养化湖泊。

sentences.english: The Shuanglong Lake is a shallow and urban lake, it had been a serious typical eutrophic lake.
sentences.chinese: 双龙湖是浅水型城市湖泊，一度为重富营养化湖泊。

sentences.english: When the hot weather hits many people decide to go to the beaches and to cabins by lakes.
sentences.chinese: 当炎热的天气访问许多人决定去海滩和舱房的湖泊。

sentences.english: Flamingos feeding lakes can be found throughout Africa.
sentences.chinese: 火烈鸟就食的湖泊遍及非洲。

sentences.english: Much organically bound carbon is deposited on inland lake bottoms.
sentences.chinese: 大量有机结合碳沉积在内陆湖泊底部。

sentences.english: Tom: There is a lake lying in the east of the city. It’s said that there are many places to explore.
sentences.chinese: 在城东有个湖泊，据说那边有很多地方可以探险。

sentences.english: With an eye out for lake deposits, I went back to get samples a few days later.
sentences.chinese: 惦记着湖泊沉积，几天后我又回去取了样本。

sentences.english: The lotus grows in ponds and lakes; so does the water lily.
sentences.chinese: 荷花在池塘和湖泊中生长，水浮莲也是如此。

sentences.english: Ribbon lakes and bogs are present throughout the area, created by depressions left by receding glaciers.
sentences.chinese: 冰川退化后形成的丝带状的湖泊和沼泽遍布这一地区。

sentences.english: The six azure lakes in Band-e-Amir are Afghanistan's first national park.
sentences.chinese: 六蔚蓝湖泊带电子阿米尔是阿富汗的第一个国家公园。

sentences.english: Oceans and lakes appear in gray.
sentences.chinese: 灰色部分为海洋和湖泊。

sentences.english: A network of canals connects the Indus to the nearby lake, which also appears flooded.
sentences.chinese: 连接印度河与附近湖泊的河网，也同样涨起洪水。

sentences.english: With abundant rivers and lakes, China boasts many good swimmers.
sentences.chinese: 中国的河流湖泊星罗棋布，游泳健儿辈出。

definition: Dahu or Tahu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
Hunei township in Kaohsiung county 高雄縣|高雄县[Gao1 xiong2 xian4], southwest Taiwan
